alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 30 at 2:02PM MST until December 03 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches with up to 2 feet possible on favored west facing ridges. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
